about_the_game:
Step into the shoes of a brilliant scientist navigating a thrilling biotech mystery, where passion, intrigue, and ethics collide. The Libido Enigma is an adult visual novel filled with suspense, romance, scientific discovery and SEX—alongside unforgettable encounters with seductive and complex characters.

As you uncover a dangerous flaw in a revolutionary libido-enhancing drug, you’ll face tough choices that could change not only your love life but the fate of cutting-edge research. Your journey involves navigating corporate secrets, ethical dilemmas, and romantic entanglements with four captivating women:

  • A fiery young researcher
  • A shadowy whistleblower
  • A stunning blonde with a hidden double life
  • And charismatic and powerful CEO

In this interactive experience, every decision counts. Choose wisely to shape the future of your relationships and expose the truth behind a corporate cover-up. With vivid storytelling, immersive visuals, and animated scenes, The Libido Enigma offers a blend of science, desire, and suspense that will keep you on edge.

Are you ready to dive into this world of romance, mystery, and high-stakes biotech drama? The answers await in The Libido Enigma.

content_descriptors.notes: The game depicts many explicit sex acts, which include oral sex, threesomes (female-female-male), creampies, vaginal sex, anal sex and breast sex.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+
  • Processor: 1 Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6-10.15, 15.0.1
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel Core M and Apple Silicon M1, M2, M3
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: The Libido Enigma

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Version: Windows 7 or higher.
  • Processor: CPU: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 or DirectX 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: A sexy biotech mystery filled lots of sex! You uncover a potential flaw with the female libido enhancement drug within your biotech company. Along the way you encounter several potential female love interests.
